short_description: vasq public relations is a public relations agency based in houston, texas, united states.
long_description:
the building block of any relationship is trust. at vasq pr, our mission is to establish trust between our clients and the people they serve. vasq pr represents businesses, organizations, products and individuals it believes in. its selectiveness about clients makes vasq pr different than most agencies. it is also what helps vasq pr succeed in developing authentic and honest awareness campaigns. it is not a publicity shop, but its campaigns secure news coverage. it believes that publicity is not the goal, but the result of a campaign that makes a difference in people's lives. at vasq pr, "p"
 stands for people. vasq pr was founded in 2010 by new york city pr veteran, joseph vasquez, who left the bright lights of manhattan for the scenic hills of austin, texas, vasq pr is now headquartered in katy, texas (south of houston), but maintains a presence in austin.
business_tags: business & organizations | advertising services | building & blocks | marketing and advertising
